edge: The idea for the film emerged from Rajkumar Hirani's interaction with medical students and his family members who became sick.
During the scripting stage, Rajkumar Hirani wanted Anil Kapoor to play the lead role.
Rajkumar Hirani initially chose Shah Rukh Khan to play the lead role, but he was forced to turn down the film due to his back problems.
Rajkumar Hirani narrated the script to Aishwarya Rai during the time he was in talks with Shahrukh Khan.
Vivek Oberoi was considered for the role, but Sanjay Dutt ultimately took the role as Munna.

cost involved in shooting a wedding scene for Munna Bhai, which led to changes in the way scenes were shot due to budget constraints

Hirani arranged to have the stills shot on an actual wedding stage set up for a real wedding near the sets. This was done to save money on some of the costs, and the production team reached an agreement with the wedding hall management to use their stage after a wedding had ended.
